description: Rich smoked salmon and peppery rocket work perfectly together in this quick fettuccine dish.
name: Smoked Salmon & Rocket Fettuccine Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pot of water to the boil and cook the fettuccine according to pack instructions and drain, reserving a couple of tablespoons of starchy water.

Heat the oil in a large pan on medium heat and cook the spring onions for 3-4 minutes, add the garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes. Stir in the lemon zest and juice, rocket and creme fraiche and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Tip the fettuccine into the pan and toss to coat, adding starchy water as necessary. Stir in the smoked salmon, top with parmesan and serve with extra lemon juice, if desired.
